author: Nerd of the Rings
description:
Get your copy of The Lord of the Rings: The Confrontation here: https://gamefound.com/en/projects/ghost-galaxy-games/lord-of-the-rings-the-confrontation-ultimate-edition
(Available in Standard, Premium, and Collector's Editions)

I recently went to the offices of Ghost Galaxy to check out their revival of The Lord of the Rings: The Confrontation.  While there, I got a chance to check out their EPIC game table, made as a map of Middle-earth!  

Special thanks to the folks at Ghost Galaxy for inviting me out to their offices to learn the game and check out the table!

#lordoftherings #boardgame #lotrconfrontation
title: An LOTR Game TABLE?! - The Lord of the Rings: The Confrontation
